programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries: The Sleepwalker Killing
programme.desc: A man (Charles Esten) confesses to killing his mother-in-law but cannot recall committing the crime.

programme.title: Code Name Banshee
programme.desc: A former assassin and his protege fight the CIA-backed killers coming to claim a bounty on his life.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs. Mecha Shark
programme.desc: When a new Mega Shark menaces mankind, the government unleashes the top-secret Mecha Shark.

programme.title: Shark in Venice
programme.desc: While investigating the death of his father, an archaeologist discovers a secret below the surface.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs. Crocosaurus
programme.desc: The world is again threatened when a new, more dangerous foe is discovered in the jungles of Africa.

programme.title: Raging Sharks
programme.desc: White sharks terrorize underwater researchers (Corin Nemec, Vanessa Angel, Corbin Bernsen).

programme.title: Shark Season
programme.desc: A great white shark relentlessly stalks three kayakers out on a remote island.

programme.title: Shark Week
programme.desc: A group of complete strangers find themselves isolated by a wealthy madman on his island compound.

programme.title: From the Depths
programme.desc: After surviving a shark attack, a young woman is plagued by nightmares.

programme.title: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon
programme.desc: Marine researchers make a startling discovery: the most menacing beast of the waters is still alive.

programme.title: Blue Demon
programme.desc: When a top-secret government project is sabotaged, mutant great white sharks are released.

programme.title: Shark Lake
programme.desc: A policewoman and a biologist spring into action when sharks go on a deadly rampage in Lake Tahoe.

programme.title: Bull Shark
programme.desc: A hungry shark begins feeding on unsuspecting lakegoers in a small Texas town.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs. Kolossus
programme.desc: When a new Mega Shark appears, it threatens the global economy.

programme.title: Sharknado: Heart of Sharkness
programme.desc: A hilarious mockumentary about the filmmaker who first dreamed of "sharks in a tornado".
